body:
Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.6 with Apple Clang 11.0.3.

I'm hoping that this will be a less painful version bump than when we added PROJ 5 or PROJ 6. Originally the PROJ developers planned on dropping `proj_api.h` in PROJ 7, but they decided to punt this to PROJ 8. I tested this with GDAL, cartopy, and libgeotiff and all build fine with PROJ 7.
title: PROJ: add v7.1.0
